getAbility(bytes32).notice: Returns the ability handler address for a given identifier.

registerAbility(bytes32,address).notice: Registers an ability handler contract for a given identifier.

resolveNight(address).notice: Resolves all queued night actions for a lobby.

unregisterAbility(bytes32).notice: Removes a previously registered ability handler.
